paragraphs.default: The lighthouse sits on the edge of a cliff, defiantly piercing the seascape behind it.
You try the door, but it seems jammed.
paragraphs.breakIn: The door is wide open, the head of an axe embedded into its front.
What used to be a handle is now splinters on the ground.

paragraphs.default: You walk back down the road.
You swing the axe at the doorâ€” it doesn't budge. You try again, harder this time, and it cracks.
The axe head snaps from the end of the handle, embedding itself in the door as it lurches wide open.
